xml.metadata:
xnbData: target: "w" compressed: true hiDef: true readerData: - type: "Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]" version: 0
- type: "Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.StringReader" version: 0
numSharedResources: 0
content: #!Dictionary<String,String>
xml.p: 4: "Oh, hi." #!String
Introduction: "Oh, that's right... I heard someone new was moving onto that old farm.#$e#It's kind of a shame, really. I always enjoyed exploring those overgrown fields by myself.$9" #!String
Resort_Entering: "I hope a mermaid visits the beach." #!String
Resort_Leaving: "I'm gonna ask Willy if we can take the scenic route back." #!String
Resort_Leaving_2: "Maybe we'll see a sea monster on the way back." #!String
Resort_Shore: "The beach is okay, but it gets boring pretty quick. I'd rather check out that dark jungle, or the volcano!" #!String
Resort_Shore_2: "Hmm, you think I could sneak my guinea pig onto the island?#$e#Nah, David's probably not much of a swimmer anyways.$h" #!String
Resort_Umbrella: "My skin gets burnt really easily. So I'm just gonna stay under this umbrella for a while.#$e#I like it in the shade. Too much sun makes me dizzy." #!String
Resort_Umbrella_2: "Hey @, want to build a sand castle with me?#$e#Actually, a sand dungeon might be cooler!$h" #!String
Resort_Umbrella_3: "Hey @, you think you could build a raft?#$e#I saw a few cool islands on the way here I want to visit." #!String
Resort_Wander: "An island this big has got to be hiding some buried treasure.#$e#Quick, get me a shovel!#$e#Relax, I'm just kidding.$h" #!String
Resort_Bar: "Gus made me a dark purple refresher, to match my hair. It tastes great!$h" #!String
Resort: "Bummer... Willy says we have to stay on the beach...$s#$b#And I brought my sword and everything...$s" #!String
danceRejection: "That's flattering... but I'm gonna have to say no. Sorry." #!String
divorced: "What are you doing here? Just leave me alone!$a" #!String
dumped_Girls: "Don't talk to me!$a" #!String
secondChance_Girls: "*sigh*... I can't stay mad at you anymore, @. Let's just move on with our lives.$s" #!String
breakUp: "Oh... I... I understand. You see me as just a friend...$s#$b#I guess we weren't really a good match...$s" #!String
Mon: "Oh, hey. Taking a break from work?" #!String
Mon2: "Oh, hi!#$e#Do you ever hang out at the cemetery? It's a peaceful place to spend some time alone." #!String
Tue: "Ugh... I'm not in a good mood right now.$s#$e#I said I'm not in a good mood... what do you want?$a" #!String
Tue2: "...*sigh*...$s#$e#I know my parents mean well, but sometimes they just cannot understand my point of view. Weren't they ever young?" #!String
Wed: "Hey. Sorry in advance if I say anything rude. I didn't get much sleep last night.#$e#What do you want?" #!String
Thu: "#$1 Abigail1#Oh no, I think my Dad's going to cook dinner tonight...$s#$e#I don't feel like doing anything today...$u" #!String
Fri: "Wow, I just realized it's Friday. $u#$e#Sometimes I totally lose track of time." #!String
Fri2: "We're all going to hang out in the saloon this evening. It's kind of like a friday tradition, I guess." #!String
Sat: "The fresh mountain air is nice on a day like this.$h#$e#I wonder if the frogs will make an appearance soon." #!String
Sun: "Oh man... I've been pushing off my homework all weekend. Looks like I'll be pulling another all-nighter...$s" #!String

Sun2: "I wonder what would happen if I spent all night in the graveyard?#$q 17/18 Sun_old#@, What do you think happens to us after we die?#$r 17 0 Sun_17#I have no idea.#$r 18 40 Sun_18#We come back as spooky ghosts.#$r 17 0 Sun_17#We go to Heaven.#$r 18 0 Sun_17#Our energy bodies enter the astral plane.#$r 17 30 Sun_nothing#Nothing. We just cease to exist." #!String
Sun_old: "$p 17#I guess you think nothing would happen, right?$u|Maybe a wicked ghost would appear!" #!String
Sun_17: "Hmm, interesting..." #!String
Sun_18: "Well that's an interesting theory!$h" #!String
Sun_nothing: "You know, that wouldn't be so bad.$8" #!String
Wed2: "Oh, hi @. Taking a break from your work?#$e#Me too. Oh! Nothing physical... just some online classes I'm taking." #!String
Tue4: "Hi, I'm glad to see you.$h#$e#I want to take my mind off things for a while... how is your day going?" #!String
Sat6: "You came all this way to visit me? That's nice.$h#$e#So have you been exploring the mountain caves at all?#$e#Interesting. I'd like to go there myself one of these days.$l" #!String
Mon8: "...Oh, @! Hi.$h#$e#Want to hang out for a while? Here! Let me read your palm. *giggle* $h" #!String
Thu10: "Hi.$l#$e#Do you feel like everything seems unreal lately?$l#$b#Not in a bad way, though.$h" #!String
Fri6: "The birds were happily chirping today. They're too simple to understand the future.#$e#It's better to be like them, isn't it?" #!String
Event_VideoGame_Yes: "Great! I'm sure you'll be able to beat this level with ease.$h" #!String
Event_VideoGame_No: "Oh? *sigh*... I guess I'll never get past this level, then...$s" #!String
Event_Grave1: "See? You understand why I'm out here, then.#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8" #!String

Event_Grave2: "Sure. I don't want to kill anything, either. I just want to do a little exploring without risking my neck!#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8" #!String

Event_Grave3: "Oh, it's because I'm a girl... isn't it? Ugh...$u^Why? I'm just as strong as you!$a#$b#I'm not some fragile princess.. I can take care of myself!$a#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8" #!String
Event_Grave4: "Really? That's surprising.$8#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8" #!String
Event_Rain_1: "I see...$8" #!String
Event_Rain_2: "Yea... I guess you would be one to appreciate this somber ambience." #!String
Event_Rain_3: "...That's true.$8" #!String
Event_Tragic_1: "Yeah... I guess my own life is okay...$s" #!String
Event_Tragic_2: "...!$h" #!String
Event_Tragic_3: "I would feel better if I could believe that...#$b#But I don't.$s" #!String
Event_Cave2_1: "@...$8" #!String
Event_Cave2_2: "@... I'm alright.$8" #!String
Event_Cave_1: "...okay.$8" #!String
Event_Cave_2: "I guess when you have something to lose, it's normal to be afraid...$l" #!String
Event_Cave_3: "...Um, okay. Sorry.$9" #!String
summer_1: "Summer's here. It's not really my favorite season.#$e#The air is so muggy I feel like I'm floating in soup." #!String
summer_Mon: "My pet guinea pig, David, just hates this hot weather. He's fussy." #!String
summer_Tue: "The air is so thick with honey and nectar all summer. I almost feel dizzy.$u" #!String
summer_Wed: "Have you decorated your house at all? That's what I'd be doing if I had a house." #!String
summer_6: "I went to the beach last night, after dark... Sometimes you can see strange lights bobbing over the sea.#$e#Or maybe that was just a dream I had... It doesn't feel real anymore." #!String
summer_Thu: "If I knew how to use a sword I would be exploring those caves by the mountain lake right now. It's probably nice and cool in there." #!String
summer_Thu4: "Ew, I hope I don't get a tan this summer.$s" #!String
summer_Fri: "I kind of wish I had a cat. Unfortunately, my Dad is allergic to pretty much everything." #!String
summer_Sat: "I'm looking forward to fall... the cool mountain breeze, the swirling red petals, the smell of mushrooms... *sigh*" #!String

summer_Sun: "Do you ever get an urge to go exploring, @?#$q 25/26 summer_Sun_old#Okay... pretend you just won a free vacation. Where would you go?#$r 25 0 Sun_25#The beach#$r 26 30 Sun_26#In a dark cave#$r 26 30 Sun_26#The old, gnarled forest#$r 25 0 Sun_25#Joja Mega-Mall" #!String
summer_Sun_old: "$p 25#I do... but you probably wouldn't like the places I'm thinking about...|Maybe we'll be neighbors someday. I think we both have similar, weird tastes.$h" #!String
Sun_25: "Huh. I think that would get old fast." #!String
Sun_26: "Yea! That sounds wonderful.$h" #!String

summer_Wed2: "I would love to live in an old farmhouse like you.#$b#The creak of a floorboard, the slow plumes of dust whispering through the rafters... There's something special about an old building, isn't there?" #!String
summer_Tue4: "You're an interesting guy, @. I'm glad you moved here.$h^You're an interesting lady, @. I'm glad you moved here.$h" #!String
summer_Sat6: "I'm actually enjoying myself this summer.$h#$e#It's funny how quickly one's outlook can change." #!String
summer_Mon8: "I used to think Pelican Town was kinda drab, but lately I'm starting to love some things about it.$h" #!String
summer_Thu10: "Wow, you look nice today.#$e#I mean, that summer air is really good for the complexion, isn't it?... heh...$l" #!String
summer_Fri10: "Do you ever get lonely on your farm?" #!String
fall_1: "Ah... Fall's here!$h#$e#I was getting so tired of summer." #!String
fall_Mon: "I need to stretch my legs and get some fresh air today." #!String

fall_Tue: "$d joja#I try to help out in the shop on most days. Business has been pretty bad since the Joja Mart opened, though.|Ever since Joja Mart shut down we've been doing great at the shop!$h" #!String

fall_Wed: "I can't wait to see some pumpkins this year.$h#$e#The spirit's eve festival happens at the end of the season. It's pretty low-key compared to what you'd see in Zuzu City, but for a small town like this it's a lot of fun." #!String
fall_Thu: "#$1 AbigailHAND#Last night I dreamt that my left hand had turned into a gigantic %noun. Does that mean anything?#$e#%Abigail doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now." #!String
fall_Sat: "$d cc#I can't believe you fixed up that old Community Center all by yourself. I'm really impressed.|Do you have any scarecrows on your farm?" #!String

fall_Sun: "Hmm... what should I do tonight?#$q 27/28 fall_Sun_old#I was thinking about dyeing my hair again... what do you think?#$r 27 10 Sun_27#Dye it black.#$r 27 10 Sun_27#Why not blonde?#$r 27 20 Sun_WildColor#How about bubblegum pink?#$r 28 0 Sun_28#I like your hair just the way it is!" #!String
fall_Sun_old: "$p 27#I was going to dye my hair but then I decided against it.|Yes? What is it?" #!String
Sun_27: "I guess that's a pretty safe choice, huh?#$e#I'll think about it." #!String
Sun_28: "Of course that's what you'd say.$u" #!String
Sun_WildColor: "You're always good for a laugh.$h" #!String
fall_Wed2: "Are you growing pumpkins on your farm this year?#$e#Save one for me!$h" #!String

fall_Tue4: "I may fight with my parents a lot, but I know they're just looking out for me. They're doing what they think is best.$s#$b#I dunno why I'm saying this to you. Don't tell anyone.$8" #!String
fall_Sat6: "Hi.$h#$e#Your hair looks cool today... did you do something different?" #!String
fall_Mon8: "You know, I could actually see myself becoming a farmer some day...#$e#But how would that ever happen? *chuckle*$l" #!String
fall_Thu10: "I had an interesting dream last night, with you in it.#$e#It was a good dream.$h" #!String
fall_Fri6: "I wish the season lasted a little longer.$8#$e#When the wind really picks up, I almost feel like a kid again." #!String
fall_Fri10: "I usually feel lonely this time of year, but not anymore.$l#$e#@, what are your plans for the future?" #!String
winter_1: "Well, fall is over...$s#$e#But I like winter, too!$h" #!String
winter_Mon: "It's just too cold to go outside much.#$e#But I do enjoy building a snowgoon.$h" #!String
winter_Tue: "Doesn't a steaming hot cup of cocoa sound good right now?" #!String
winter_Wed: "Hi. Is it boring to be a farmer during the winter?" #!String
spring_12: "I'm definitely going to enter the egg hunt tomorrow. Are you?" #!String
spring_23: "Well, tomorrow is the flower dance. Dancing is alright, but they make me wear this stupid white dress...$s" #!String
winter_7: "I'm looking forward to making a snow man tomorrow." #!String
fall_26: "Will I see you tomorrow at the Spirit's Eve festival? Look for me in the haunted maze.$h" #!String
summer_10: "Everyone's excited for the Luau tomorrow. Maybe a little nervous, too, considering the Governor will be here." #!String
summer_27: "You can't miss tomorrow's festival. It's one of the most beautiful wonders of the valley." #!String
winter_24: "I'm going to eat so much cranberry sauce tomorrow.$h" #!String
winter_Thu: "Another year is almost over.#$e#It goes by so fast, doesn't it?$s" #!String
winter_Fri: "One thing I've learned living here... everyone stares at you if you look different." #!String
winter_Sat: "It's the weekend!#$e#That means I can play twice as many video games.$h#$e#Bye." #!String

winter_Sun: "Oh, hello.#$q 29/30 winter_Sun_old#I made these two drawings. What do you think?#$r 29 20 Sun_29#I like the jungle island and the tiger.#$r 30 5 Sun_30#I like the orc with the battleaxe.#$r 29 -50 Sun_Bad#I don't like either of them." #!String

winter_Sun_old: "$p 29#Remember those drawings I showed you a while ago? I accidentally threw them away.$s|Remember that drawing I showed you with the orc? I entered it into an online contest and won 50g!$h" #!String
Sun_29: "Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense." #!String
Sun_30: "I'm glad. It's embarrassing to share your art with others. But I think you and I are on the same page." #!String
Sun_Bad: "Rude! Why would you hurt my feelings like that? You're so insensitive!$s" #!String
winter_Wed2: "Hi. If you're ever bored, you can always hang out in my room.#$e#As long as I'm not changing, of course!" #!String
winter_Tue4: "It's so cold, I wish we had a hot cup of cocoa to share.$h" #!String
winter_Sat6: "I've been daydreaming a lot lately...#$e#Oh! You want to know what it's about? Well...$u#$b#...It's a secret.$h" #!String
winter_Thu10: "Another year is almost over...#$b#But this was a really good year, don't you think?$h" #!String
winter_Wed6: "It must be nice not having crops to worry about this time of year.#$e#And that means you can hang out with me more often!$h" #!String
winter_Fri10: "@, there's something I want to tell you...#$e#It's just... um... well... your boots! They, uh...look really clean... *gulp*#$e#That's all... *sigh*$s" #!String
